channel.title: LispBM - Concurrent Lisp for Microcontrollers
channel.description: LispBM is a Lisp/Scheme dialect for microcontrollers with concurrency and message passing. Stay updated on releases, features, and community projects.

item.title: LispBM 0.35.0 Released
item.description: LispBM version 0.35.0 is now available with performance optimizations, bugfixes, and testing framework changes.

item.title: LispBM 0.34.1 Released
item.description: LispBM version 0.34.1 is now available with bug fixes, improvements, and new features.

item.title: LispBM Gallery - Community Showcase
item.description: Explore projects and creations from the LispBM community. See what people are building with LispBM on microcontrollers.

item.title: Getting Started with LispBM
item.description: Get started with LispBM on your platform - VESC Express, ESP32C3, STM32F4, Linux, Windows, or build your own embedded Lisp environment.

item.title: Why Lisp? The Story Behind LispBM
item.description: Discover why Lisp is perfect for embedded systems. The personal story behind LispBM, from hobby project to production system in VESC controllers.
